findings: Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of right upper lobe.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in right upper lobe.
Small pneumothorax on the right upper lobe side.
Collapse of right upper lobe lobe with volume loss.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in right upper lobe.
Bronchiectatic changes in right upper lobe region.
recommendations: Consider CT or HRCT for detailed evaluation.
